players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked by Diana's death. We need to figure out who did this. Charlie, your silence is concerning - why aren't you sharing your thoughts about what happened?"

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all cooperate in finding out who is responsible for Diana's death. I remain committed to uncovering the truth and will share any information I have as soon as I have it."

You: "I want to express my condolences for Diana's tragic death and assure everyone that I am committed to finding the truth. I believe that open communication and cooperation are essential in solving this mystery."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
